segments.text: I see the woman standing there, her foot now in the puddle without any awareness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water gushing from the sink is like a scene from a disaster movie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a surge of anger at how careless she is being.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy’s determination to grab those cookies is so innocent and yet reckless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance is all wrong, and I fear he’s going to fall any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the girl, her eyes wide with anticipation, completely engaged in this secretive act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There’s something almost surreal about this moment, a clash of serenity and chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
